page.title: 08TOURISM IN MID DEVON
page.content: The area is in the centre of Devon and visitors with cars can explore north and south coasts of the county and Cornwall. Dartmoor is within easy reach, Exmoor and Bodmin can be visited as can several National Trust properties and other tourist attractions of the S.W. Many of the farms in the area offer bed and breakfast or have converted out- buildings as holiday flats with the aid of a grant. There are also several cottages which are let to holiday- makers. Tourism is thus becoming important to the economy of the area to augment the income from farming and will probably continue to grow with the increase in leisure pursuits. The season is, however, short and there is some fear that facilities are increasing faster than demand.
